name: Howdoyousay
0: ”Alexa, ask how do you say S u p e r c a l i f r a g i l i s t i c e x p i a l i d o c i o u s”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: how do you say
des: Spell a word and Alexa will speak it back to you! It will help you pronunciate the word. This skill is easy to use even for kids! The activation words are intentionally kept simple so that they can activate it easily.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
